name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-my-notifications
title: My Notifications
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension shows real time notifications for Lists and Libraries
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allow user select any library or list to receive real time notifications when data changes. Create, Edit, Delete, Renamed... This ACE, use Microsoft Graph endpoint, SocketIO Client, connect to SocketIO List Server to get all the notifications.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
